summary: The customer is informed that they have a total outstanding amount of 1,70,000 rupees and that they need to make the payment soon or the account will become legal. The customer explains that they are undergoing a heart problem and will make the payment soon. The agent asks when the payment can be made and the customer informs that they will send the documents to the agent. The agent asks when the documents can be sent and the customer informs that it will be sent soon. The conversation ends with the customer thanking the agent and hanging up.
